headline: Here’s Why Interpublic Group of Companies (IPG) Reported an Earnings Miss
summary: Ariel Investments, an investment management company, released its “Ariel Appreciation Fund” fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Global markets in 2024 exceeded forecasts, primarily due to the overwhelming success of the “magnificent seven,” or mega-cap technology stocks. Despite the concentration of gains, the optimism was fueled by the […]

headline: Earnings Preview: Interpublic Group (IPG) Q4 Earnings Expected to Decline
summary: Interpublic (IPG) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
